Reviews.Title: Useless!
Reviews.Author: Nikki
Reviews.Content: Why buy a digital camera you cant even get the pictures off of without paying? Nothing indicated that the only way to retrieve the pictures off this was to take it into a Walgreens. What a waste of time!

Reviews.Title: Misleading
Reviews.Author: Cavanaughty
Reviews.Content: The camera only holds 50 pictures.  Seller failed to note that you cannot upload the pictures from the camera without going to Walgreens and paying to get them printed.  Only then can you get a copy of your pictures on a disc.  This definitely should have been included in the product description.

Reviews.Title: Great Value Camera!
Reviews.Author: Paula J Herendeen
Reviews.Content: Great camera and wonderful value. Thanks!  It is very easy to use and Walgreens photo staff are friendly and helpful.  Good camera for young teen ager.
